p:
1pctCO2 is an idealized fully coupled carbon/climate simulation initialized from steady state of the pre-industrial control run and atmospheric CO 2 concentration prescribed to increase 1% yr −1 until quadrupling of the pre-industrial level. The simulations esmFixClim and esmFdbk and are set up as the 1pctCO 2 with the difference, that in esmFixClim (esmFdbk) only the radiative effect from increasing CO 2 concentration is included, while the carbon cycle sees the pre-industrial CO 2 level (vice versa)
28, 45 .
